custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: alisson-anjos
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LLaVA-Describer
custom_nodes.description: This is an extension for ComfyUI to extract descriptions from your images using the multimodal model called LLaVa. The LLaVa model - Large Language and Vision Assistant, although trained on a relatively small dataset, demonstrates exceptional capabilities in understanding images and answering questions about them. This model shows behaviors similar to multimodal models like GPT-4, even when presented with unseen images and instructions.

custom_nodes.author: chaosaiart
custom_nodes.title: Chaosaiart-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides various custom nodes to assist in configuring the workflow structure.

custom_nodes.author: shadowcz007
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-Image-reward
custom_nodes.description: [a/ImageReward](https://github.com/THUDM/ImageReward): Human preference learning in text-to-image generation. This is a [a/paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.05977) from NeurIPS 2023

custom_nodes.author: Nevysha
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-nevysha-top-menu
custom_nodes.description: A simple sidebar tweak to force fixe the ComfyUI menu to the top of the screen. Reaaally quick and dirty. May break with some ComfyUI setup.

custom_nodes.author: Big-Idea-Technology
custom_nodes.title: LLM_Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: LLM_Node enhances ComfyUI by integrating advanced language model capabilities, enabling tasks such as text generation, content summarization, and question answering. This flexibility is powered by the renowned T5 model architecture and other transformer models, depending on the specific deployment.

custom_nodes.author: zhangp365
custom_nodes.title: zhangp365/Some Utils for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Group collaborative learning network, termed GCoNet+, which can effectively and efficiently co-salient objects in natural scenes. This repo pack GCoNet-plus as ComfyUI nodes, and make this fast SOTA model easier use for everyone.

custom_nodes.author: ExponentialML
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - Native DynamiCrafter
custom_nodes.description: DynamiCrafter that works natively with ComfyUI's nodes, optimizations, ControlNet, and more.

custom_nodes.author: ExponentialML
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_VisualStylePrompting
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Version of '[a/Visual Style Prompting with Swapping Self-Attention](https://github.com/naver-ai/Visual-Style-Prompting)'

custom_nodes.author: chflame163
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Face Similarity
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI. It compare two images to rate facial similarity.

custom_nodes.author: Nuked
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-N-Sidebar
custom_nodes.description: A simple sidebar for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ZHO-ZHO-ZHO
custom_nodes.title: DepthFM IN COMFYUI
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial implementation of [a/DepthFM](https://github.com/CompVis/depth-fm) for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: ratulrafsan
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-SAL-VTON
custom_nodes.description:
Dressup your models!
This is my quick implementation of the SAL-VTON node for ComfyUI.
Based on the paper [a/Keyu Y. Tingwei G. et al. (2023). Linking Garment with Person via Semantically Associated Landmakrs for Virtual Try-On](https://openaccess.thecvf.com/content/CVPR2023/papers/Yan_Linking_Garment_With_Person_via_Semantically_Associated_Landmarks_for_Virtual_CVPR_2023_paper.pdf)

custom_nodes.author: gokayfem
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Texture-Simple
custom_nodes.description: Visualize your textures inside ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Jannchie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-J
custom_nodes.description: This is a completely different set of nodes than Comfy's own KSampler series. This set of nodes is based on Diffusers, which makes it easier to import models, apply prompts with weights, inpaint, reference only, controlnet, etc.

custom_nodes.author: logtd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-InversedNoise
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Inversed Euler Sampler, Mix Noise with Latent, Combine Latent Noise

custom_nodes.author: Seedsa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fooocus Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides image generation features based on Fooocus.

custom_nodes.author: huchenlei
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DanTagGen
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node of [a/Kohaku's DanTagGen Demo](https://huggingface.co/KBlueLeaf/DanTagGen?not-for-all-audiences=true).

custom_nodes.author: MokkaBoss1
custom_nodes.title: Backgrounds (Landscape,Indoor)
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Indoor Backgrounds, Landscape Backgrounds. Custom nodes for ComfyUI which allows selective 'randomness' in constructing a prompt for portrait backgrounds.

custom_nodes.author: flowtyone
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Flowty-CRM
custom_nodes.description:
This is a custom node that lets you use Convolutional Reconstruction Models right from ComfyUI.
[a/CRM](https://ml.cs.tsinghua.edu.cn/~zhengyi/CRM/) is a high-fidelity feed-forward single image-to-3D generative model.

custom_nodes.author: Big Idea Technology
custom_nodes.title: Image Text Overlay Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ImageTextOverlay is a customizable Node for ComfyUI that allows users to easily add text overlays to images within their ComfyUI projects. This Node leverages Python Imaging Library (PIL) and PyTorch to dynamically render text on images, supporting a wide range of customization options including font size, alignment, color, and padding.

custom_nodes.author: ArdeniusAI
custom_nodes.title: CPlus_Ardenius ComfyUI Control Box
custom_nodes.description: 1 node to have control over your workflow.

custom_nodes.description: Wrapper nodes to use DynamiCrafter image2video and frame interpolation models in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.description: Wrapper nodes to use SUPIR upscaling process in ComfyUI

Font/Text Animation + Speech to Text Transcription

custom_nodes.author: Cornea Valentin
custom_nodes.title: ControlNet Auxiliar
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI custom node, named ControlNet Auxiliar, is designed to provide auxiliary functionalities for image processing tasks. It is particularly useful for various image manipulation and enhancement operations. The node is integrated with functionalities for converting images between different formats and applying various image processing techniques.

custom_nodes.author: cdb-boop
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Bringing Old Photos Back to Life
custom_nodes.description: Enhance old or low-quality images in ComfyUI. Optional features include automatic scratch removal and face enhancement. Based on Microsoft's Bringing-Old-Photos-Back-to-Life. Requires installing models, so see instructions here: https://github.com/cdb-boop/ComfyUI-Bringing-Old-Photos-Back-to-Life.

custom_nodes.author: kingzcheung
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_kkTranslator_nodes
custom_nodes.description: These nodes are mainly used to translate prompt words from other languages into English. PromptTranslateToText implements prompt word translation based on Helsinki NLP translation model.It doesn't require internet connectionã€‚

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Depth-Visualization
custom_nodes.description: Works with any Depth Map and visualizes the applied version it inside ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: dchatel
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_facetools
custom_nodes.description: These custom nodes provide a rotation aware face extraction, paste back, and various face related masking options.

custom_nodes.author: Extraltodeus
custom_nodes.title: PerpPrompt-for-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This nodes gather similar vectors and uses them either enhance the conditioning or make it more precise and enhance the prompt following. It is a cleaned up and simplified version of [a/Conditioning-token-experiments-for-ComfyUI](https://github.com/Extraltodeus/Conditioning-token-experiments-for-ComfyUI) with the method that works the most.

Custom ComfyUI Nodes for interacting with [a/Ollama](https://ollama.com/) using the [a/ollama python client](https://github.com/ollama/ollama-python).
Integrate the power of LLMs into CompfyUI workflows easily.

custom_nodes.description: Tell your dream and it interprets it and puts you inside your dream

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Matting
custom_nodes.description: This node improves the quality of the image mask. more suitable for image composite matting

custom_nodes.author: diSty
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Frame Maker
custom_nodes.description: This node creates a sequence of frames by moving and scaling a subject image over a background image.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: LoRTnoC-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
This is a repository for using LoRTnoC (LoRA with hint block of ControlNet) on ComfyUI.
NOTE:Please place the model file in the same location as controlnet. (Is this too arbitrary?)

custom_nodes.author: victorchall
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui Webcam capture node
custom_nodes.description:
This node captures images one at a time from your webcam when you click generate.
This is particular useful for img2img or controlnet workflows.
NOTE:This node will take over your webcam, so if you have another program using it, you may need to close that program first. Likewise, you may need to close Comfyui or close the workflow to release the webcam.

custom_nodes.author: dfl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Custom Sampler nodes that implement Zheng et al.'s Trajectory Consistency Distillation based on [a/https://mhh0318.github.io/tcd](https://mhh0318.github.io/tcd)

custom_nodes.author: CozyMantis
custom_nodes.title: Cozy Human Parser
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI node to automatically extract masks for body regions and clothing/fashion items. Made with ðŸ’š by the CozyMantis squad.

custom_nodes.author: atmaranto
custom_nodes.title: SaveAsScript
custom_nodes.description: A version of ComfyUI-to-Python-Extension that works as a custom node. Adds a button in the UI that saves the current workflow as a Python file, a CLI for converting workflows, and slightly better custom node support.

custom_nodes.author: jw782cn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Catcat
custom_nodes.description: Extension to show random cat GIFs while queueing prompt.
